title: I need to stop this account
body:
Hello riot  I have been trying to contact you from my ticket and it has been over 12 hours.
I need my account stopped since it seems somebody else is using it.
I need your help in advance.

replies.body: It does kinda of look like someone might have gained access to your account without your permission. I've gone ahead and made sure this account is kept safe for the time being, and you should be getting a response to your little pretty soon.
I have also sent a ticket for your information from my main account craft zeppelin.
